subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: If the White Sox move third baseman Gordon Beckham to second base this off-season, he will draw more comparisons to Ryne Sandberg, who made a similar switch early in his career.
snippet: If the White Sox move third baseman Gordon Beckham to second base this off-season, he will draw more comparisons to Ryne Sandberg, who made a similar switch early in his career.
